short_summary: Insights Discovery virtual workshops and material packages
description: The contract is for Employment and Social Development Canada to obtain services for delivery of Insights Discovery workshops and virtual material packages, to help employees understand themselves and their colleagues for more respectful and productive relationships. The contract is for one year and two option years.

full_summary:
## Call for Bidders - Insights Discovery Virtual Workshops

### Job Title

Insights Discovery Virtual Workshops and Corresponding Virtual Material Packages

### Reference Number

PW-22-01018609

### Tender Status

Closed: The bidding period has ended.

### Description

This tender is for Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) to provide Insights Discovery virtual workshops and corresponding virtual material packages for a period of one year, with two additional one-year options.

### Objective

ESDC, specifically the Atlantic Region of Service Canada, aims to engage a contractor to deliver Insights Discovery workshops and provide the necessary virtual kits to participants. The primary goal is to enhance employee understanding of themselves and their colleagues to foster better relationships, communication, and collaboration despite virtual boundaries.

By attending these workshops, participants will:

* Improve their interactions and relationships with colleagues
* Identify areas of strength and development
* Develop better communication skills
* Better understand their own and others' preferences

### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Service Contract
* Procurement Method: Open Tender
* Estimated Duration: One year, with two option years
* Funding: [None disclosed]

### Key Contact

* Name: Linda Handregan
* Email: nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

### Attachment

The tender documents can be found on the Canada Buys platform:

* [French Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/c7d9e5ce8cc67ede5260e5de85b5d34f/rfp_-_fr_final.pdf)

### Notice URL

None published.

Note: I removed redundant information and simplified some of the entries. I also tried to keep the size of the text to about 400 words, as instructed. Please let me know if you have any further requests.  Thank you for the consideration.
